statements: DELETE FROM voter_registration_data WHERE voter_id = 1001 AND voter_name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM voter_registration_data WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01' AND voter_age > 30
DELETE FROM voting_history WHERE election_year = 2020 AND vote_cast = 'yes';
DELETE FROM voting_history WHERE voter_id = 100 AND election_year = 2020;
DELETE FROM voter_demographics WHERE voter_name = 'John Doe' AND voter_age = 35;
DELETE FROM voter_address WHERE voter_id = 2002 AND city = 'New York';
DELETE FROM VotingHistory WHERE vote_cast = FALSE;
DELETE FROM VoterDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND income > 50000;
